text: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ

translation.en.sahih: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah].
translation.id.indonesian: Mereka berkata: "Sesungguhnya kami dahulu, sewaktu berada di tengah-tengah keluarga kami merasa takut (akan diazab)".
